title: Classify Grocery Product Bulk
description: Provide a set of product jsons, get back classified products.

(post body).Name: (post body)
(post body).Description: A json array containing objects, each with the product title.

locale.Name: locale
locale.Description: The display name of the returned category, supported is en_US (for American English) and en_GB (for British English).

quota: Calling this endpoint requires 0.5 points per classified product. Learn more about quotas.
